Quick Reference

Use browser print for a paper table aid. This page is formatted to stay compact and readable when printed.

Setup

  • Two players.
  • Standard suited decks (ideal: one deck per player).
  • Use Ace, numbered cards, and face cards.
  • Joker optional, expansion-style content only.

Turn Loop

  1. Choose front-row attacker.
  2. Attack same column.
  3. Resolve overflow: front -> back -> player LP.
  4. Reinforce if column breaks.
  5. Pass turn.
